attributes.action: teach all school children about The Enlightenment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The enlightenment brought about some of the most fundamental changes to the way Britons live today e.g. that you do not have to believe in God to be moral - having the affect of reducing the power of religious zealots of ordinary citizens. 

A more fundamental undertstanding of The Enlightenment might go some way to help the debate about social cohesion and the importance of the secular state to all of us - agnostics, christians, muslims and others alike.
